subject: AI & Agents
title: The Gig Economy and AI Management
description: A quick, practical guide to The Gig Economy and AI Management.

hook.text: A delivery driver is fired by an algorithm. No human reviewed the decision. No appeal is possible.

buildup.text: Gig platforms use AI to assign work, set pay, rate workers, and terminate contracts.

discovery.text: Algorithmic management can optimize efficiency but strips workers of negotiation and human oversight.

twist.text: Workers game the algorithm in return â€” creating a cat-and-mouse cycle of optimization.

climax.text: Labor movements worldwide are pushing for transparency and human review of algorithmic work decisions.

punchline.text: Your boss is an algorithm. And it doesn't take complaints.

quiz.question: What problem does algorithmic management create for gig workers?
options: Workers face decisions with no human review or appeal process
It gives workers too much freedom
Algorithms always pay workers more than human managers
